description.name:
City
 operation
description.description: Take control of city area
description.levelMainTask: You are a Major of National AirForce Squad 1 in Limebrook city, You task is to find and protect General McAlister at Air force base and take aircraft, Talk to the people, do their tasks

description.name: Night City Fire
description.description: Fly to Tower-15 research complex
description.levelMainTask: Fly through the Limebrook city sky under enemy attack to the Tower-15 research center

description.name: Tower-15 Research Center
description.description: Find Tower-15 research center, find more about project 'Oasis'
description.levelMainTask: Find the way inside the research complex, find more about project 'Oasis', Talk to the people, do their tasks (get the 'Sphere №1')

description.name: Limebrook Grand Canyon
description.description: A Canyon 40 miles East of city Limebrook
description.levelMainTask: Fly through battlefield, to leave the dangerous region, and reach the White Sands

description.name: White Sands Desert
description.description: Large desert, you must fly through
description.levelMainTask: Fly through the desert to reach the Ancient ruins

description.name: Temple Ruins
description.description: Find the Object: 'Sphere №2' somewhere in this area
description.levelMainTask: You must find the 'Sphere №2' somewhere in this area, and take it to the Cloud-City-1

description.name: Cloud City 1
description.description: One of the largest and the modern city in the world
description.levelMainTask: You must break through the enemy blockade, and reach the government tower

description.name: City Government Tower
description.description: Talk to the government about situation
description.levelMainTask: Find the way to the government hall, Talk to Minister, Talk to the Science Doctor Edward (get the 'Special Permission')

description.name: Above the City
description.description: Destroy the enemy signal blocker ship, to fly in space and reach the Moon Gate

description.name: Earth Orbit
description.description: Leave the Earth
description.levelMainTask: Break through the Enemy blockade, on Earth orbit, reach the Moon orbit

description.name: Moon outpost-gate approach
description.description: Fly through the Moon hills
description.levelMainTask: Fly through the Moon hills, approach to the Outpost-Gate-1

description.name: Moon Outpost-Gate-1
description.description: You must reboot the reactor and launch quantum gate
description.levelMainTask: Find the way through the Moon Outpost, reboot reactor, talk to the worker, launch quantum gate and fly to the new point to get to the Venus

description.name: Solar Power Station
description.description: Fly through the station and reach the Venus Quantum Gate
description.levelMainTask: Solar Power Station - is the 'Midway' of the Quantum Gate system, Fly through the station and reach the Venus Quantum Gate

description.name: Venus Orbit
description.description: Venus orbit insertion, and enter the atmosphere
description.levelMainTask: Break through Venus blockade, and land on the platform near Ishtar Terra Region

description.name: Venus Clouds
description.description: Fly to the factory platform
description.levelMainTask: Fly through the clouds and land on factory platform, near Ishtar Terra

description.name: Venus Plant
description.description: Find Signal of Sphere №4 using Venus flying Carbon Processing Plant
description.levelMainTask: You must detect (Sphere №4) and transmit it's signal to the Earth, talk to the platform workers

description.name: Road to Mars
description.description: Mars orbit insertion
description.levelMainTask: Fly to the Mars to find Object № 3

description.name: Mars Alpha Side
description.description: Approach the Mars colony
description.levelMainTask: Fly through the Mars hills to land on the Alpha Side

description.name: Mars Research Facility
description.description: Find the Entrance to the Facility
description.levelMainTask: Find the way to the colony, find workers, talk to scientists, (get the 'Sphere №3') send Sphere №3 signal to Earth

description.name: Mars City 1
description.description: Destroy Enemy keeper to escape the planet
description.levelMainTask: Destroy Enemy keeper to fly to the Asteroid field Quantum gate

description.name: Asteroid Field
description.description: Reach the next Quantum gate to the Jupiter

description.name: Jupiter System
description.description: Jupiter orbit insertion
description.levelMainTask: Entrance the Jupiter orbit, align and docking to the Odyssey station

description.name: Jupiter Odyssey Station
description.description: Repair the system
description.levelMainTask: Repair the system (get the 'Gate Coordinate Access'), talk to the Captain, align Quantum system  to the Neptune moon Triton (enemy base)

description.name: Triton Approach
description.description: Break through the enemy defence
description.levelMainTask: Break through the enemy defence and land on the Triton surface

description.name: Triton Monad Region
description.description: Destroy the Base keeper

description.name: Triton enemy base
description.description: Find and Destroy 'Prime Builder' super mind and escape
description.levelMainTask: Find Entrance to the base, find and destroy 'Prime Builder' super mind, take the control 'Sphere', escape the base
